page.title: 17 Leisure in Cwmbran
page.content:
Results of a Survey on Leisure -------------------------------- 1. The reasons people had a hobby: fun, relaxation, achievement, to earn money or to keep fit. 2. The achievements they have made: passing exams, winning cups, finalist in competitions and even getting two "Holes in one". 3.Children spend their free time : swimming, watching TV, keeping pets, playing football and cricket. 4. Hobbies that adults have: gardening, watching TV, DIY, listening to the radio, reading or going to the pub. 5. What families do together: Watch TV, jogging,cinema,swimming and listening to the radio.
Survey conducted by Oakfield
